lead_paragraph: The University of Texas regents approved a $200,000 raise for Coach Rick Barnes yesterday to increase his salary to $2 million a year. Barnes has led the Longhorns to the N.C.A.A. tournament in each of his nine seasons. Texas went 25-10 last season behind the freshman Kevin Durant, who last week announced he would enter the N.B.A. draft.
